summary:
The Security Council,
 
Reaffirming previous resolutions on Timor-Leste, particularly 1599 (2005), 1677 (2006), and 1690 (2006),
 
Noting the reports of the Secretary-General of 8 August 2006 (S/2006/628) and 26 July 2006 (S/2006/580) on Justice and Reconciliation for Timor-Leste,
 
Noting letters from the Prime Minister of Timor-Leste dated 4 August 2006 (S/2006/620, annex) and 9 August 2006 (S/2006/651, annex),
 
1. Decides to extend the mandate of UNOTIL until 25 August 2006;
 
2. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
